UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthetic Oligopeptides Mimicking γ-Core Regions of Cysteine-Rich Peptides of Solanum lycopersicum Possess Antimicrobial Activity against Human and Plant Pathogens
Literature.Author: Slezina MP, Istomina EA, Kulakovskaya EV, Abashina TN, Odintsova TI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cryptococcus neoformans VKM Y-2755(IC50=5.1±1.2µM),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis VKM Ac-1403(IC50=24.0±2.4µM),Fusarium culmorum VKM F-2303(IC50=42.4±3.5µM),Fusarium solani VKM F-142(IC50=138.8±6.1µM),Fusarium verticillioides VKM F-670(IC50=99.8±10.0µM)
